entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
